title: Loan Extra Payment Time Saved
description: Estimate months saved by adding extra to loan payments.
expression: (function(p,rate,years,extra){const r=rate/100/12;const n=years*12;const pay=p*r*Math.pow(1+r,n)/(Math.pow(1+r,n)-1);const newPay=pay+extra;const newN=Math.log(newPay/(newPay - r*p))/Math.log(1+r);return n-newN;})(principal,rate,termYears,extra)

examples.description: $200k at 5% for 30y with $200 extra ⇒ 51 months saved
$100k at 4% for 15y with $100 extra ⇒ 19 months saved

faqs.question: Why is the result in months?
faqs.answer: It shows how many months earlier the loan ends.

faqs.question: Does it include fees?
faqs.answer: No, it assumes fixed rate and regular payments.

disclaimer: Approximation only; consult lenders for official schedules.
